## Introduction

This is a default template for the `bookup-html` custom quarto format.

You can learn more about `bookup` in its [Github repository](https://github.com/juba/bookup-html).

You can learn more about controlling the appearance of HTML output at the [quarto website](https://quarto.org/docs/output-formats/html-basics.html).
